Reviews.Title: “Forget this hotel, go elsewhere”
Reviews.Author: yvonnecolebert
Reviews.Content: nightmare experience hotel husband stayed one room teenage son stayed next room 15 yr old daughter around midnight man started calling room thinking talking daughter said seen elevator wanted come tea coffee assured wrong room give 15 mins later called knew talking correct room told wrong room hung daughter went sleep 130 man started calling come meet really mad hung time called front desk told someone 15 yr old daughter time said couldnt tell room calls made asked security told none said would send security never happened another call came hung immediately called front desk help oh sorry ill send security never came daughter called husband change rooms us next morning told us man tried room floor room immediately across room night lack security appalling never would go back

Reviews.Content: hotel adequate needed pros upgraded room suite looked st peters staff friendly accomodating quite residential area free shuttle area though stops around 700 pm cons central rome train stops running 1030 pm restuarants chose area pay gym access internet cost expensive breakfast buffet expensive overall dont mind public transportation good hotel

Reviews.Content: stayed hotels around world hotel service far immaculate good shuttle service city available rooms clean bed far firm bed ever 3 english tv channels expensive internet horrible customer service waited 2 hours room service menu waited hour lobby staff talked phone took forever find hotel dont even try taking train hotel poorly absolutely nothing within walking distance hotel space shuttle limited often full room service food staff always seems like something better help

Reviews.Content: first want address location doesnt matter amazing hotel italy far sights used public transportation ie trains felt totally reasonable romes subway system frequent trains signs long wait never wait five minutes get line take short walk train station hop train go three stops get gemelli hotel less five minute walk away problem train doesnt run often train stations rome good job train comes even almost got train going right direction reason stopping gemelli station caught right trains right times could 15 minute trip heart rome dont could take good hour felt reasonable considering cheap tickets one journey day pass recommendation husband found tiring often ridiculous hotel nice travelers usa arrived long check staff friendly helpful able get room 10am large beautiful wood floors balcony expecting comfortable bed nice bathroom recently marriott theyve understand scheduled called courtyard felt much nicer average courtyard hotel room see marriott anything entire hotel must hurry make overall felt good value rate per night nice clean comfortable sights anything closer priced hard get central rome could take time depending trains youre dont mind waiting train stations great budget option rome

Reviews.Title: “Definetly Not a 4-Star.....”
Reviews.Author: combusus
Reviews.Content: perfect modern american hotel yet w european flair visited rome april wanted home modern hotel bathroom etc hotel extremely clean comfortable quiet oasis large city heart rome shuttle leaves every 30 minutes take approx 15 mins arrive location close vatican metro station never problem catching shuttle though read summer full suite room w seperate bedroom extremely satisfied restaurant onsite great local restaurants blocks away quiet residential area still urban feel highly recommend hotel want modern hotel willing travel slightly heart rome

Reviews.Title: “Location, location, terrible location.”
Reviews.Author: KOtraveler
Reviews.Content: stayed 5 nights hotel close center rome located 1015 minutes central train station termini get train schedule hotel trains time bad thing dont night trains tired walking city stay night also 3 train stops opposite direction center rome beach definitely go hotel great big rooms clean bathroom also big restaurant good food big fantastic staff exceptionally polite friendly professional would reccomend hotel anyone 2 days spare especially children pool ideal
